MAKING A SLAVE

MAKING A SLAVE

WATCH NOW

There are 46 million slaves in the world today, roughly 13,000 of them live in Britain. Most are controlled by organised gangs and few people know what their lives are like. Four volunteers have agreed to be modern day slaves for 24 hours. Their experience is based on first hand testimony from a survivor rescued in Great Britain.
